Text: lol you guys are so retarded. what a huge waste of time and money

all this talk of love and all I see is guns, (I like guns by the way). Instead of worrying about which of your fantasy gods loves who, try just loving each other.......and NOT in THAT way either. Live for today, because no matter what your 'folks' told you and some book, NO ONE knows what happens after you die. No One. Stop being afraid and be men (and women) for **** sake!!!
